para: This guide gives information on how the CDK library is being developed. It contains links to software that is needed to compile the software, or to create packages.
It also includes guide lines on how to write documentation about the software and as JavaDoc in the software. None of this is currently enforced or required.
Important! This guide is an ongoing documentation project. It is far from complete right now, many things are still missing. Please, add additional content to cvs or email it to me.
